00025 using System;
00026 using System.Collections.Generic;
00027 using MathNet.Numerics;
00028 using MathNet.Numerics.Properties;
00029 
00030 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Interpolation.Algorithms
00031 {
00035     public class RationalInterpolation :
00036         IInterpolationMethod
00037     {
00038         IList<double> _t;
00039         IList<double> _x;
00040 
00047         public
00048         RationalInterpolation()
00049         {
00050         }
00051 
00056         public bool SupportsDifferentiation
00057         {
00058             get { return false; }
00059         }
00060 
00065         public bool SupportsIntegration
00066         {
00067             get { return false; }
00068         }
00069         
00075         public
00076         void
00077         Init(
00078             IList<double> t,
00079             IList<double> x
00080             )
00081         {
00082             if(null == t)
00083             {
00084                 throw new ArgumentNullException("t");
00085             }
00086 
00087             if(null == x)
00088             {
00089                 throw new ArgumentNullException("x");
00090             }
00091 
00092             if(t.Count != x.Count)
00093             {
00094                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentVectorsSameLengths);
00095             }
00096 
00097             _t = t;
00098             _x = x;
00099         }
00100 
00107         public
00108         double
00109         Interpolate(
00110             double t
00111             )
00112         {
00113             const double tiny = 1.0e-25;
00114             int n = _t.Count;
00115 
00116             double[] c = new double[n];
00117             double[] d = new double[n];
00118 
00119             int nearestIndex = 0;
00120             double nearestDistance = Math.Abs(t - _t[0]);
00121 
00122             for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00123             {
00124                 double distance = Math.Abs(t - _t[i]);
00125                 if(Number.AlmostZero(distance))
00126                 {
00127                     return _x[i];
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 if(distance < nearestDistance)
00131                 {
00132                     nearestIndex = i;
00133                     nearestDistance = distance;
00134                 }
00135 
00136                 c[i] = _x[i];
00137                 d[i] = _x[i] + tiny;
00138             }
00139 
00140             double x = _x[nearestIndex];
00141 
00142             for(int level = 1; level < n; level++)
00143             {
00144                 for(int i = 0; i < n - level; i++)
00145                 {
00146                     double hp = _t[i + level] - t;
00147                     double ho = (_t[i] - t) * d[i] / hp;
00148 
00149                     double den = ho - c[i + 1];
00150                     if(Number.AlmostZero(den))
00151                     {
00152                         return double.NaN; // zero-div, singularity
00153                     }
00154 
00155                     den = (c[i + 1] - d[i]) / den;
00156                     d[i] = c[i + 1] * den;
00157                     c[i] = ho * den;
00158                 }
00159 
00160                 x += (2 * nearestIndex) < (n - level)
00161                     ? c[nearestIndex]
00162                     : d[--nearestIndex];
00163             }
00164 
00165             return x;
00166         }
00167 
00175         public
00176         double
00177         Differentiate(
00178             double t,
00179             out double first,
00180             out double second
00181             )
00182         {
00183             throw new NotSupportedException();
00184         }
00185 
00192         public
00193         double
00194         Integrate(
00195             double t
00196             )
00197         {
00198             throw new NotSupportedException();
00199         }
00200     }
00201 }
